detail_desc: Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip. Notch lapels, shoulder tabs with metal fasteners, zipped front pockets and long sleeves with quilted details. Patterned lining.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Small V-neck opening with ties at the front, a flounce at the top, and narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in satin with a high waist, wrapover front with ties at one side and concealed buttons in the waistband. Lined.
Wide cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and ties at the waist. Long, wide sleeves and narrow cuffs with a button. Unlined.
Shopper in jacquard-weave cotton with two handles at the top and decorative tassels. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 13.5 cm. Height without handles 30 cm. Width 36 cm.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Bikini with a shimmering, gold-coloured pattern. Bikini top with glittery, gold-coloured, elasticated shoulder straps that cross at the back, a frill at the top and lined front. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill at the top.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted, one-shoulder jersey top.
Vest top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a deep neckline front and back. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton piqué.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in a lightly crêped weave with a V-neck at the back, lacing at the front and concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Clamdiggers in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Patch front pockets, flap back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.

Block-heeled ankle boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip in one side and decorative straps with a metal buckle. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. One open chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a seam at the waist with a crossover detail. Unlined.
Short, wide dress in a soft viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with gathers to create a gentle drape, buttons at the back and raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut top in cool viscose jersey with a sightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a rib-trimmed shaft. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with short cap sleeves with raw roll edges and a raw-edge rolled hem.
Fitted top in soft ribbed fabric with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with fake front pockets, a concealed zip at the back and a fringed hem. Lined.

Shorter jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a round, ribbed neckline and long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Cut out section at the back with sewn-on ties at the back of the hem.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and buttons down the front. Lined.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.

Ankle-length dress in a soft weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and pleats at the front for extra width. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a racer back and rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in one side and straight-cut legs with seams at the front.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and reflective details. Ventilating mesh panel down the back, a zipped back pocket and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, yoke and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shorts in fine-knit cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets and roll-edge hems.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, high collar at the front and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Thermal fleece inside.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, and tie belt at the waist. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs, hem and front edge. Soft brushed inside.
Short, stretchy skirt in imitation leather with front pockets and a soft, detachable belt with D-rings. Lined.

Cropped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and V-neck with lacing. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, ribbed sections at the sides and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
5-pocket shorts in soft washed denim with a regular waist and slightly longer legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Body in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a text pendant. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, contrasting colour zip and concealed zipped pockets at the front. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and dungaree dress in a cotton weave. Top with a round neck and short sleeves. Dress with adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Tailored waistcoat in twill with buttons and fake pockets at the front. Lined.

A-line tunic in airy, flock-print chiffon with a double-layered stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Flounces down the front that continue down the back, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Pin-tucks at the top and around the cuffs and top of the hem, and a wide flounce at the hem. V-neck inner dress in a softly draping viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail at the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a V-neck and drawstring at the front.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft and platform soles. Lacing at the front with speed hooks at the top and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Thin metal chain necklace with shell-shaped metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length 35-42 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with cap sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.

Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Lace frills down the front that continue over the shoulders, and long sleeves with lace trims at the cuffs.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Low platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the top and a wide loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Platform back 5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Thong briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck and opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with pleats at the front, a sewn-on tie belt, and straight, wide legs.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
